main: ^One of your passengers realizes it's their birthday today.
FirstChoice: ^Everyone sings loudly and off-key. It's the thought that counts, and it makes the birthday special. (PARTY happiness +1)
SecondChoice: ^You joke about forgetting, but it doesn't land well. Awkward silence follows. (PARTY happiness -1)
ThirdChoice: ^You stop at a gas station and find a snack that resembles a cake. It's not much, but it's enough to make the day memorable. (PARTY happiness +1.5, food -1)
